021import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
022import net.tnemc.core.currency.Denomination;
023import net.tnemc.core.currency.item.ItemCurrency;
024import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.serialization.JSONAble;
025import org.json.simple.JSONArray;
026import org.json.simple.JSONObject;
027import org.json.simple.parser.JSONParser;
028import org.json.simple.parser.ParseException;
029
030import java.math.BigDecimal;
031import java.util.Map;
032import java.util.UUID;
033
034/**
035 * SerialCurrency
036 *
037 * @author creatorfromhell
038 * @since 0.1.2.0
039 */
040public class SerialCurrency implements JSONAble<Currency> {
041
042  /**
043   * Used to serialize this object to a JSON-valid string.
044   *
045   * @param currency The object to serialize.
046   *
047   * @return The {@link JSONObject} associated with the JSON-valid String.
048   */
049  @Override
050  public JSONObject toJSON(final Currency currency) {
051
052    final JSONObject json = new JSONObject();
053
054    json.put("startingHoldings", currency.getStartingHoldings().toString());
055    json.put("maxBalance", currency.getMaxBalance().toString());
056    json.put("minBalance", currency.getMinBalance().toString());
057    json.put("uid", currency.getUid().toString());
058    json.put("iconMaterial", currency.getIconMaterial());
059    json.put("identifier", currency.getIdentifier());
060    json.put("type", currency.getType());
061
062    json.put("format", currency.getFormat());
063    json.put("symbol", currency.getSymbol());
064    json.put("prefixes", currency.getPrefixes());
065    json.put("decimal", currency.getDecimal());
066    json.put("display", currency.getDisplay());
067    json.put("displayPlural", currency.getDisplayPlural());
068    json.put("displayMinor", currency.getDisplayMinor());
069    json.put("displayMinorPlural", currency.getDisplayMinorPlural());
070    json.put("separateMajor", currency.isSeparateMajor());
071    json.put("majorSeparator", currency.getMajorSeparator());
072
073    json.put("decimalPlaces", currency.getDecimalPlaces());
074    json.put("minorWeight", currency.getMinorWeight());
075
076    //Item currency
077    if(currency instanceof ItemCurrency item) {
078      json.put("ender", item.canEnderChest());
079    }
080
081    //Note
082    if(currency.getNote().isPresent()) {
083
084      json.put("note", new SerialNote().toJSON(currency.getNote().get()));
085    }
086
087    //Denominations
088    final JSONArray denominationsArray = new JSONArray();
089    for(final Denomination denom : currency.getDenominations().values()) {
090
091      denominationsArray.add(new SerialDenomination().toJSON(denom));
092    }
093    json.put("denominations", denominationsArray);
094
095    // Conversion
096    final JSONArray conversionArray = new JSONArray();
097    for(final Map.Entry<String, Double> entry : currency.getConversion().entrySet()) {
098
099      final JSONObject conversionObject = new JSONObject();
100      conversionObject.put("identifier", entry.getKey());
101      conversionObject.put("rate", entry.getValue());
102      conversionArray.add(conversionObject);
103    }
104    json.put("conversion", conversionArray);
105
106    return json;
107  }
108
109  /**
110   * Used to generate information for this object from
111   *
112   * @param serialized The JSON-valid String that we are going to deserialize.
113   *
114   * @return The object that was deserialized from the JSON string.
115   */
116  @Override
117  public Currency fromJSON(final String serialized) {
118
119    final JSONParser parser = new JSONParser();
120
121    try {
122      final JSONObject jsonObject = (JSONObject)parser.parse(serialized);
123
124      final Currency currency = (jsonObject.containsKey("ender"))? new ItemCurrency("USD") : new Currency("USD");
125
126      currency.setStartingHoldings(new BigDecimal((String)jsonObject.get("startingHoldings")));
127      currency.setMaxBalance(new BigDecimal((String)jsonObject.get("maxBalance")));
128      currency.setMinBalance(new BigDecimal((String)jsonObject.get("minBalance")));
129      currency.setUid(UUID.fromString((String)jsonObject.get("uid")));
130      currency.setIconMaterial((String)jsonObject.get("iconMaterial"));
131      currency.setIdentifier((String)jsonObject.get("identifier"));
132      currency.setType((String)jsonObject.get("type"));
133
134      currency.setFormat((String)jsonObject.get("format"));
135      currency.setSymbol((String)jsonObject.get("symbol"));
136      currency.setPrefixes((String)jsonObject.get("prefixes"));
137      currency.setDecimal((String)jsonObject.get("decimal"));
138      currency.setDisplay((String)jsonObject.get("display"));
139      currency.setDisplayPlural((String)jsonObject.get("displayPlural"));
140      currency.setDisplayMinor((String)jsonObject.get("displayMinor"));
141      currency.setDisplayMinorPlural((String)jsonObject.get("displayMinorPlural"));
142      currency.setSeparateMajor((Boolean)jsonObject.get("separateMajor"));
143      currency.setMajorSeparator((String)jsonObject.get("majorSeparator"));
144
145      currency.setDecimalPlaces(((Long)jsonObject.get("decimalPlaces")).intValue());
146      currency.setMinorWeight(((Long)jsonObject.get("minorWeight")).intValue());
147
148      //Item currency
149      if(currency instanceof ItemCurrency item) {
150        item.setEnderChest((Boolean)jsonObject.get("ender"));
151      }
152
153      //Note
154      if(jsonObject.containsKey("note")) {
155
156        final JSONObject noteJson = (JSONObject)jsonObject.get("note");
157        currency.setNote(new SerialNote().fromJSON(noteJson.toJSONString()));
158      }
159
160      //Denominations
161      final JSONArray denominationsArray = (JSONArray)jsonObject.get("denominations");
162      for(final Object denomObj : denominationsArray) {
163
164        final JSONObject denomJson = (JSONObject)denomObj;
165        final Denomination denom = new SerialDenomination().fromJSON(denomJson.toJSONString());
166
167        currency.getDenominations().put(denom.weight(), denom);
168      }
169
170      //Conversion
171      final JSONArray conversionArray = (JSONArray)jsonObject.get("conversion");
172      for(final Object entryObj : conversionArray) {
173
174        final JSONObject entryJson = (JSONObject)entryObj;
175        final String identifier = (String)entryJson.get("identifier");
176        final Double rate = (Double)entryJson.get("rate");
177        currency.getConversion().put(identifier, rate);
178      }
179
180      return currency;
181    } catch(ParseException e) {
182
183      e.printStackTrace();
184      return null;
185    }
186  }
187}
